TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthenticationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class FormsAuthenticationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件提供数据。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于事件为提供的值**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件并使您能够指定为当前请求的自定义标识。The class is used to supply event values to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom identity for the current request. 构造对象使用当前和将其传递给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 你可以使用属性来设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值期间属性**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**使用事件、 窗体身份验证票证的 cookie 或 URL 中提供的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used. **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件才会引发时身份验证设置为和是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块。The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前到具有自定义对象。The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a object with a custom . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.HttpContext context) cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造对象使用所提供`context`的值作为属性。The constructs a object using the supplied `context` as the value for the property. 然后将其传递对象传递给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。It then passes the object to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对访问， ，和为当前请求的对象。The provides access to , , and objects for the current request.

span.span: The object to be associated with the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来设置属性的当前向自定义对象。You can use the property to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未指定的值期间属性**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**使用事件、 窗体身份验证票证的 cookie 或 URL 中提供的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件设置属性的当前到具有自定义对象。The following example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a object with a custom .
